name: Hole Digging Game
description:
to move: press or hold the arrow keys

to not move: do not press or hold the arrow keys

to dig a hole: press space                                     

to not dig a hole: do not press space

to rest: do nothing for a time      

to sleep: rest for a time  

to die: do something, or nothing, for 0-85 years

----------------------------------------------------------

optional: to show commands : press K 

various options here will allow you to generate patterns, spawn entities, change or disable aesthetic options, and set various options to your liking, and see debug data,
